mapper.insert: insert into users (name, id, password, carnum, phonenum, email, regdate, image) values (#{name},#{id},#{password}, #{carnum},#{phonenum},#{email}, now(),#{image})
mapper.select: select no, name, id, password, carnum, phonenum, regdate, image, status from users where id=#{id } and password=#{password }
select no from users where id=#{id }
select no, name, carnum, phonenum, email, image from users where no=#{no }
